name: Dungeon Adventure(Hand Tracking)
summary:
Welcome to the dungeon - our dark world! 

You will confront a variety of enemies within the dungeon! Unleash your arsenal of hand gesture-recognized weapons and engage in thrilling battles with them!
Victory is destined for the brave warriors! 

In the game, you have over forty weapons that can be recognized through hand gestures. Each weapon possesses its own unique characteristics. You can freely switch between different types of guns, knives, scepters, bows and arrows, magic orbs, and more. Once you...
